name: Gravity Shift (ChaoticPixel, SlipperyMoose96)
description:
Gravity Shift is a Co-Op Puzzle Platformer where one Player is on the ground and the other Player is on the ceiling. Players will need to switch up places in order to complete puzzles together.

In Gravity Shift your goal is to work together with your co-op partner to reach the end of each level. Restarts will only happen when chosen or when the time runs out. There are no deaths or other ways to fail the levels. Gravity Shift contains no violence.

Gravity Shift is currently in a Work-In-Progress state.
